input: You get like six different kinds of pastries in a basket and then you know your bacon and your cappuccino and the whole thing. Oh my gosh the calories. So I needed to be walking when I got back. We took a catamaran out. Well someone else pilots it you know. You have a captain and like there were like I guess six people on the boat that worked on the boat.
offline_reference: 你会收到一个篮子，里面装着六种不同的糕点，然后还有你的培根、卡布奇诺和全套早餐，天啊，热量高得吓人，所以我回来时必须得走着才行。我们租了一艘双体船出海，不过船是别人开的，你知道的，有船长，大概船上还有六个人在工作。
